EnemyInfo.Name: Rinka
EnemyInfo.Description:
The donuts that attack you in Tourian. The keep respawning and float towards Samus until they hit or go offscreen.
RAM: $0F86 (Special): $6000 (Respawn) $0FB4 (Speed1): Spawn Mode
Submitted by dewhi100

Property.Name: Spawn Mode
Property.Description: If 0, the rinka will always spawn where you have placed it. Otherwise, the game will keep spawning it wherever it thinks is good for trolling Samus (could be anywhere). Speed 1-3 are used in MBs room to teleport the rinkas around the room to follow Samus without having 9 rinkas actually placed in the room and running off screen. It will only make sense in a room with MB's room's layout.
